summary: proc: fix PIE proc-empty-vm, proc-pid-vm tests
details:
proc: fix PIE proc-empty-vm, proc-pid-vm tests

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 6d114116da1be5995207becafa4be4d64f20591d, it was introduced in version v6.1 by commit 5bc73bb3451b9e449828694733a4c6b413ceeb3b. For more details please see the references link.
